questions.text: When Kandi was singing Christmas carols on Charlie's piano, to what tune was she singing the songs?
questions.explanation:
Heart and Soul.

	Alan walked into the living room looking for Jake and heard Kandi singing Christmas carols at the piano. She was singing "Frosty the Snowman", "Jingle Bells", and "Silent Night" to the "Heart and Soul" tune.

questions.text: Did anyone know Jake was getting drunk on eggnog?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Berta had made Charlie some eggnog with a liquor in it and Jake took a glass. After having his first glass, he kept going back for more without anyone seeing him. When Judith and Herb left the party, he threw up in the car in the middle of saying "The Night Before Christmas".

questions.text: When Herb said he was a doctor, who asked, "A real one, or like Alan?"
questions.explanation:
Kandi.

	Herb met Kandi for the first time and introduced himself as a doctor. When Kandi asked if he was like Alan, Herb said he was a pediatrician. Kandi thought he looked at people's feet.

questions.text: When Dorothy saw Alan again, she commented that he had finally grown into what body part?
questions.explanation:
Ears.

	Alan opened the door to see Dorothy, who Evelyn had called to the party. She told Alan that they had met when Alan being potty trained. Evelyn had call Dorothy to Charlie's house to help her stop Charlie and Gloria from spending the night together.

questions.text: What secret did Evelyn and Dorothy reveal to Charlie and Gloria in his bedroom?
questions.correct: They could be brother and sister
options: Alan and Gloria were brother and sister
Evelyn didn't know who Charlie's father was
questions.explanation:
They could be brother and sister.

	Dorothy and Evelyn had to tell Gloria and Charlie the truth so they wouldn't sleep together. Gloria still wanted to sleep with him since there was a chance they weren't related, but Charlie refused and left the bed.

questions.text: Who did Evelyn blame for her husband's fling?
questions.explanation:
OPEC.

	Evelyn blamed OPEC for the fling that her husband and Dorothy had because there was a gas shortage in the early seventies and they had to find things to do at home.

questions.text: What was the first gift Charlie gave Jake for Christmas in this episode?
questions.explanation:
$100 dollars.

	When Jake gave Charlie a can of fart for his Christmas present, Charlie gave Jake $100 dollars and then ended up splitting the cost of the Nintendo Wii system with Alan.

questions.text: According to Alan, who cooked chocolate chip cookies with walnuts and Demerol?
questions.explanation:
Judith's mother.

	Judith and Herb showed up at Charlie's to pick Jake up to go see his parent's and Alan got to talking about Judith's mother leaving the Betty Ford clinic on a lawn mower. He did say one of the highlights was when she baked cookies with walnuts and Demerol.

questions.text: What secret did Berta and Rose discover while standing outside Charlie's room?
questions.correct: Dorothy and Evelyn had a fling in the seventies
options: Evelyn adopted one of the boys
questions.explanation:
Dorothy and Evelyn had a fling in the seventies.

	Berta and Rose were outside Charlie's room when Evelyn and Dorothy came out of Charlie's room and started talking about the fling they had in the seventies. A very drunk Berta referred to that secret as 'the third act'.

questions.text: Dorothy slept with Charlie to get back at Evelyn for sleeping with her husband.
questions.explanation:
False.

	At the end of the show, Dorothy slept with Alan to get back at Evelyn for sleeping with her husband. Alan didn't mind at all.
